name: Rabbids Rumble
description:
Collect over 100 Delirious Rabbids: Capture and collect over a hundred Rabbids with unique and delirious combat abilities. Train your collection of Rabbids to make them stronger and test them in battles.

Challenge Your Friends: Play intense and hilarious one-on-one battles with your friends, mixing strategy and Rabbids’ humor.

Play Hilarious Mini-Games: Interact with the Rabbids in new mini-games that will make them surging from your floor, flying around you or fighting on your kitchen table!

The Battle Continues in the Street: Share scores, gain training bonuses, unlock new Rabbids and items with other players you cross thanks to the “Street Pass” feature.

Complete Your Collection with Spot Pass: With new, rare Rabbids, downloadable every week on your Nintendo 3DS™, complete your collection thanks to the “Spot Pass” feature.
